name: ONAS Remastered
description: Hello Welcome To "Sunny's Pizza" Kid Anyway, I Know You've Been Chased By The Big Bad Monsters Ok I'll Handle Them Later, What I Need You To Do For Now Is Maintain Them And Before 6:00 Ok?  They Should Stop When 6:00 Gets Called! Now This Is A Life Or Death Situation Meaning If They Get To Your Door They Will Do Something VERY Bad So What Imma Need You To Do Is That Sunny Goes Through The Door Ok? And You See That Big Vent? Captain Will Go Through There! So When the Animatronics Appear, CLOSE THE DOOR Immediately... Now I Don't Have Enough Time To Still Talk But Ill Be Able To Pick You Up Once I Find The Back Entrance And Unlock The Door. Ok Good Luck Kid I'm Counting On You...
